content:
Tyler Bray releases a pass just before being hit during a game against Florida on Saturday Sept PERIOD  PERIOD The Vols were unable to keep the success of their first two games going in to The Swamp falling  to the Gators PERIOD

GAINESVILLE Fla PERIOD  Derek Dooley worried how Tennessee would respond when it got its first scars PERIOD



The Volunteers certainly left Gainesville Fla PERIOD with their fair share PERIOD



Floridas speedy tailbacks and talented defensive line bruised UT to a  victory Saturday afternoon in front of  in Ben Hill Griffin Stadium PERIOD



I told the team if you are going to compete for championships you are going to get scars on you Dooley said PERIOD Ive been saying this all season PERIOD We didnt have any scars on us and today we got plenty of them. the biggest scar that could linger the rest of the season is the injury to sophomore receiver Justin Hunter who hurt his left knee on UTs opening drive PERIOD Hunter didnt return and is possibly out for the rest of the season PERIOD



Its tough losing one of your goto guys as a quarterback UTs Tyler Bray said PERIOD But we still had a whole three quarters to come back and make plays which we failed to do. when Hunter went down the Vols   SEC were already trailing  PERIOD Florida   took the opening kickoff and marched  yards in nine plays for a touchdown when quarterback John Brantley found a wideopen Trey Burton in the end zone on a 3rdandgoal play from the UT 1yard line PERIOD



The Vols first possession ended when Michael Palardy missed a 37yard field goal PERIOD Florida added a field goal on its next drive to take a  lead late in the first quarter PERIOD



After UTs next drive faltered Floridas Chris Rainey blocked a Palardy punt to give the Gators the ball inside UTs 15yard line PERIOD



The Vols defense held firm but UF was able to tack on another field goal to extend its lead to  PERIOD The Gators would eventually lead  before UT got on the scoreboard PERIOD



Helped by two pass inference penalties against Florida Bray led the Vols on a sixplay 89yard drive to cut UFs lead to  with  left in the second quarter PERIOD



UT caught the Gators blitzing and Bray found an uncovered Marlin Lane out of the backfield on the 8yard touchdown pass PERIOD



The Vols hoped to carry that momentum into the second half but it quickly swung back in favor of the home team after one offensive play PERIOD



After Lane returned the kickoff to the UT 28yard line Bray was picked off by Floridas Josh Evans at the UT  PERIOD



I thought I got it over him PERIOD Even DaRick said he thought I got it over him Bray said PERIOD The guy just made a great play. the Gators would drive  yards in  plays to make the score  PERIOD After a UT punt and a negative rushing play Brantley dumped the ball off to Chris Rainey in the flat and the 5foot9 174pound speedster outraced UTs defense  yards for a touchdown to put UF up  with  left in the third quarter PERIOD



They drop it down and Rainey looks like hes in the Olympics and everybodys chasing him Dooley said PERIOD



Rainey finished with  allpurpose yards including  rushing and  receiving PERIOD Brantley was 14of23 for  yards and two touchdowns PERIOD



Tennessee would make the score  after Bray connected with DaRick Rogers for a 12yard touchdown strike late in the third quarter PERIOD



Palardy added a field goal early in the fourth quarter to bring the Vols within two scores at  PERIOD



Floridas Caleb Sturgis kicked his fourth field goal of the game with  left to put the Gators up  PERIOD



Brays third touchdown came on an 18yard pass to tight end Mychal Rivera to end the scoring for the game PERIOD



Bray finished 26of48 for  yards and three touchdowns and two interceptions including one to Floridas Matt Elam at the UF 17yard line with  remaining that essentially ended UTs hopes for a comeback PERIOD



You cant win every game every year Rogers said PERIOD But footballs a game of adversity PERIOD Weve just got to fight hard and work hard and come back strong. log In
